programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: A girl in Nazi-occupied France goes into hiding with help from a schoolmate -- a boy who risks everything to give her the chance to survive. Together, they find first love in a stunning, magical world of their own creation.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: M3GAN is a marvel of artificial intelligence, a lifelike doll that's programmed to be a child's best friend. When a brilliant roboticist gives her young niece an M3GAN prototype, it soon becomes violent and does anything to protect the girl.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Michael Light and a team of athletes compete in the Adventure Racing World Championship. As they get pushed to the outer limits of endurance, a dog named Arthur comes along for the ride, redefining what victory, loyalty and friendship truly means.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: A space adventurer (Chris Pratt) becomes the quarry of bounty hunters after he steals an orb coveted by a treacherous villain, but after he discovers the orb's true power, he must find a way to unite four ragtag rivals to save the universe.

programme.desc: A girl in Nazi-occupied France goes into hiding with help from a schoolmate -- a boy who risks everything to give her the chance to survive. Together, they find first love in a stunning, magical world of their own creation.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: When veteran comedy writer Charlie Burnz meets New York singer Emma Payge, they form an unlikely yet touching friendship that kicks the generation gap aside and redefines the meaning of love and trust.

programme.title: Power Book III: Raising Kanan
programme.desc: Unique and his soldiers assume control of the corners in Queens, leaving Raq and Marvin in desperate need of more answers and more product; Kanan searches for a missing O-Cee.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Geena finally decides to leave her criminal husband Clyde and their isolated Texas hideout, but a couple from New York suddenly arrives. Ignoring the risks, she convinces Clyde to let them stay, a decision with dangerous consequences.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: The life of conservative radio host Lionel Macomb is turned upside down when his 16-year-old niece, Tess, suddenly shows up, questioning everything he stands for.

programme.title: Movie
